QAPair.Question: What is (are) Sterile technique ?
QAPair.Answer: Sterile means free from germs. When you care for your catheter or surgery wound, you need to take steps to avoid spreading germs. Some cleaning and care procedures need to be done in a sterile way so that you do not get an infection. Follow your health care provider's instructions on using sterile technique. Use the information below as a reminder of the steps.
